item.title: How to deploy a static web site to GitHub pages
item.description: Hello everyoneðŸ¤©! This post will show you how to deploy your static site to GitHub pages. In the last post, I introduced you to how to deploy HUGO’s static website to Amazon S3, but one of the consciousness must be the price. As far as a free tier, S3 will provide 5G in standard S3 storage, 20,000 GET/mon, and 2,000 PUT/mon. It would be charitable, and generous service, but you might still worry about if you should check out, specifically student.
